extendedInfo.description: du Data Manager is an application designed to help customers manage National Data Service and avoid unexpected charges in the bill. Who can use this app?The app will work for du consumer mobile postpaid and data line subscribers only. At the moment, Enterprise or Pre-paid customers will NOT be able to use the app.Features included:Purchase of Data Bundles:Users can purchase, upgrade, downgrade or deactivate their Data Bundles.Note: The existing upgrade/downgrade/deactivation rules of Data Bundle apply.Keep Track of Data Usage:du Data Manager can be used any time to see how much data has been consumed and to check the remaining data balance. The data consumption displayed is real time.Manage Data Spend:With the du Data Manager, one can see the current data consumption and the forecasted usage till the end of the Bill cycle.Set Notifications:Users have an option to get instant notifications when usage exceeds a certain amount of data. By default notifications are sent at 70%,80% and 100 % of the available data allowance however users can set their own limits on the app. Once usage has reached 100 % users will be offered the option to purchase an additional Data Bundle or to buy/upgrade their existing bundle.Track Data Usage by Service:Users have an option to get an update on the consumption pattern of their data usage. Users will get to know the breakup by usage category like Web Browsing ,Email, Social Networking, video streaming etc.Multi Language:The app is available in English and Arabic.How to register your number1. Switch off your WiFi2. Make sure mobile data is active and in use, this should pick up your phone number automatically3. Restart the application4. Select "Register a new account" if you have not already registered 5. Type in your password

reviews.title: Not able to register my number
reviews.comment: **UPDATE II Aug 26**  I\'m an Enterprise customer and the software only works with regular Postpaid connections. Will wait for the next release.  **UPDATE Aug 26**  I tried the steps you mentioned but it still says \'Please enter your mobile number\'  Just like some of the others I\'m also not able to type my number in the field... I\'m using Galaxy S4. Please fix!
reviews.author: Shahid Khalil
